name: Polished Paddle
description:
Polished Paddle

My entry for the Tutorial Jam.

Based on the Squashy tutorial from PICO-ZINE #1.

Controls

Use the cursor keys and any one of these keys: Z, X, C, V, M, or N.

Music

Music by Gruber from Pico-8 Tunes Vol. 1 under a Creative Commons license.

Tracklist:

  • Menu: Ice
  • Game: Space
  • Game Over: Village
